start.text: Yes yes yes, I'm on my way...
Don't remind me it's dangerous in space.
Speaking of which, who are they again?
Don't worry, I'll protect you if you need it.
It's just a space battle... Right?
Can I ask for overtime payment?

start_boss.text: ...Of course I'll protect you... You'd do the same thing, right?
Experience has taught me that guys like this might just incidentally have nothing better to do.
They have a few spell cards... Ugh? No such thing?
It's okay, my intuition is always accurate.
The lives of all the people on board? Of course I'll take care of them!
If I can get back, I'll have to settle the score with that old hag...
The need to fight with all my might? It's up to me to decide such things.
Is it weird to be protected by a girl? Ah... But this is obviously more convenient...

retreat.text: Just so you know, I have almost zero experience with retreats.
Nearly covered in bruises, but we can come back.
I'll protect you, I'll do my best.
I didn't play well in the battle, but at least it was easy to get you out.

out_of_missiles.text: Just because you don't have your bombs anymore doesn't mean you can't fight.
Now is the real zero P duel...

engaged.text: Now it's time for the tough talk.
All fighters are facing each other.
It's an ugly battle, but the momentum is really intense.
Still, I don't like the look of such desperation.
Let nature take its course, naturally...

need_help.text: It looks like it's going to take a little effort...
"I'll be right back"? You're so considerate...
It's true that even a genius has to retreat when faced with a commoner who's been through a lot.
I'm not as fragile as you think, am I?

pursuing.text: It would be nice if I could use my powers at times like this...
Is there any way to trap them?
So as I've said many times, don't underestimate Reimu.
It's exciting to watch them struggle... Seems a little strange...

running.text: Whether it's a spellcard duel or here, being flexible and retreating is a must.
If you have time, can you come and help me turn around?

hull_90.text: The damage is noted... No... I'm just a little excited...

hull_50.text: I'm alright with Shinigami, but I don't really want to see her now...
Thanks for asking, I'm not fine... But only for a while...
The feeling of killing and fighting...
Is the battlefield beautiful at times like this?

hull_30.text: Looks like you'll have to protect me...
...Nearly at the end of the line...
Something like a memory came into my head...
It seems that I can't continue to immerse myself in the battle...

overload.text: Am I going to die if I can't handle it?
It's as beautiful as a spell card...
Don't worry, I'm just a little mentally shaken.
...Can anyone tell me what's going on?

death.text: ...Sorry, I seem to have been put into the escape pod unconscious...

victory.text: Mission accomplished, it's finally over, good...
So, the incident is resolved, and the routine returns.
